data.text: Marv~elous☆★☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>Marv~elous☆★☆

data.text:
It was the day of the Selection race we had been preparing for. 
Marvelous Sunday seemed to be in top condition.
data.processed:
<story>It was the day of the Selection race we had been preparing for. 
<story>Marvelous Sunday seemed to be in top condition.

data.text:
Even though I was just helping, I still felt excited. 
There was something I wanted to tell her after the race was over.
data.processed:
<story>Even though I was just helping, I still felt excited. 
<story>There was something I wanted to tell her after the race was over.

data.text:
Everyone's nervousness, excitement, and passion! As I 
thought, races are Marvelous☆ Today feels like it'll 
be the beginning of something amazingly Marvelous★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Everyone's nervousness, excitement, and passion! As I 
<story>thought, races are Marvelous☆ Today feels like it'll 
<story>be the beginning of something amazingly Marvelous★

data.text:
Ahaha, there she goes again. 
Hello~, we're the Impromptu Cheer Squad~.
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha, there she goes again. 
<story>Hello~, we're the Impromptu Cheer Squad~.

data.text:
Yaho- Marve-chin! How're you feeling? 
Feeling Marvelous today too?
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Yaho- Marve-chin! How're you feeling? 
<story>Feeling Marvelous today too?

data.text:
Of course! Maya, Nature, and Laurel too, make sure you don't 
miss a thing! I'll show you a special kind of Marvelous today☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Of course! Maya, Nature, and Laurel too, make sure you don't 
<story>miss a thing! I'll show you a special kind of Marvelous today☆

data.text:
Fufuu, I wouldn't take my eyes off of my cute rival. 
So make sure you show us a wonderful Marve-chan-like race♪
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Fufuu, I wouldn't take my eyes off of my cute rival. 
<story>So make sure you show us a wonderful Marve-chan-like race♪

data.text:
……Looks like you're feeling fine, so I'm a little relieved. 
And you haven't been collapsing lately, good job.
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>……Looks like you're feeling fine, so I'm a little relieved. 
<story>And you haven't been collapsing lately, good job.

data.text:
That's because I've had Trainer with me! They've been helping 
me get prepared to show everyone this special Marvelous!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>That's because I've had Trainer with me! They've been helping 
<story>me get prepared to show everyone this special Marvelous!

data.text:
All of it's been for the sake of today's Marvelous☆ I want 
to show everyone the greatest Marvelous as soon as I can!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>All of it's been for the sake of today's Marvelous☆ I want 
<story>to show everyone the greatest Marvelous as soon as I can!

data.text:
I heard a voice urging the participants to gather 
at the gate. I told her to do her best out there――
data.processed:
<story>I heard a voice urging the participants to gather 
<story>at the gate. I told her to do her best out there――

data.text: Thanks Trainer! Ah, but before that――
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>Thanks Trainer! Ah, but before that――

data.text: I'm going to the bathroom!!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>I'm going to the bathroom!!

data.text:
That timing, right before a race, seemed quite whimsical. 
I guess she wasn't feeling too nervous……maybe.
data.processed:
<story>That timing, right before a race, seemed quite whimsical. 
<story>I guess she wasn't feeling too nervous……maybe.

data.text:
Under a clear sky, the Uma Musume run towards their 
dream in their debut, a selection race, 2200m on turf!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Under a clear sky, the Uma Musume run towards their 
<story>dream in their debut, a selection race, 2200m on turf!

data.text:
The next generation. What kind of race will 
these 12 Uma Musume show us? And they now――Start!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>The next generation. What kind of race will 
<story>these 12 Uma Musume show us? And they now――Start!

data.text:
The leading group formed quickly. Marvelous Sunday 
takes up the rear…… is she conserving her strength?
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>The leading group formed quickly. Marvelous Sunday 
<story>takes up the rear…… is she conserving her strength?

data.text:
(Ragged breath, the pressure is making my 
skin tingle! As I thought, races are amazing, 
there are so many Marvelous things☆★☆)
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>(Ragged breath, the pressure is making my 
<story>skin tingle! As I thought, races are amazing, 
<story>there are so many Marvelous things☆★☆)

data.text:
(I want to let loose……but I can't yet. Trainer 
taught me……it's important to be patient too)
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>(I want to let loose……but I can't yet. Trainer 
<story>taught me……it's important to be patient too)

data.text:
Eeeh, Marve-chin, what's wrong!? 
She's not going zoooom like usual!?
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Eeeh, Marve-chin, what's wrong!? 
<story>She's not going zoooom like usual!?

data.text:
She even said she was feeling fine. 
Maybe her stamina's……?
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>She even said she was feeling fine. 
<story>Maybe her stamina's……?

data.text:
But she's not falling behind, she's properly keeping up. 
Maybe, she's got something in mind.
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>But she's not falling behind, she's properly keeping up. 
<story>Maybe, she's got something in mind.

<story>Her friends voiced their concerns. Certainly, 
<story>if it was the normal Marvelous Sunday, 
<story>she'd be aiming to be in the front group.

data.text:
But like Sakura Laurel said, this was her strategy. 
Conserve your energy for the early stages, and then――
data.processed:
<story>But like Sakura Laurel said, this was her strategy. 
<story>Conserve your energy for the early stages, and then――

data.text:
All 12 gather as they round the 3rd corner. 
The front group seems to be close together, 
could this be a tough spot for those in the back!?
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>All 12 gather as they round the 3rd corner. 
<story>The front group seems to be close together, 
<story>could this be a tough spot for those in the back!?

data.text: Marve-chin~~!! You can still do it~~!!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed: <story>Marve-chin~~!! You can still do it~~!!

data.text: Goooo~~ Don't lose~~!!
data.name: Nature&Laurel
data.processed: <story>Goooo~~ Don't lose~~!!

data.text:
(Ahaa, Mayano and the others' voices. 
……cheering is something Marvelous……)
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>(Ahaa, Mayano and the others' voices. 
<story>……cheering is something Marvelous……)

data.text:
(Now, running together with everyone, the smell of the 
turf, the beating of my heart, it's all……all so Marvelous……)
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>(Now, running together with everyone, the smell of the 
<story>turf, the beating of my heart, it's all……all so Marvelous……)

data.text:
(Why does it feel so great……!? I'm not alone……
everyone's here……it's all sparkling brightly……)
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>(Why does it feel so great……!? I'm not alone……
<story>everyone's here……it's all sparkling brightly……)

data.text:
(But this isn't enough, further ahead is that special Marvelous! 
So I could show everyone that, up until today――)
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>(But this isn't enough, further ahead is that special Marvelous! 
<story>So I could show everyone that, up until today――)

data.text:
You'll help me with training!? If you do, 
will I be able to show that special Marvelous to everyone!?
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>You'll help me with training!? If you do, 
<story>will I be able to show that special Marvelous to everyone!?

data.text: 『You'll be able to for sure!』
data.processed: <story>『You'll be able to for sure!』

data.text:
It just feels like that Marvelous feeling keeps building up☆ 
If I keep on building this up more and more then――
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>It just feels like that Marvelous feeling keeps building up☆ 
<story>If I keep on building this up more and more then――

data.text: 『Everyone will see that Marvelous!』
data.processed: <story>『Everyone will see that Marvelous!』

data.text: 『Everyone will see that Marvelous!』
data.processed: <story>『Everyone will see that Marvelous!』

data.text:
(Trainer is supporting me in helping spread 
this Marvelous feeling! When we're together, 
the excitement and surprises just keep coming!)
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>(Trainer is supporting me in helping spread 
<story>this Marvelous feeling! When we're together, 
<story>the excitement and surprises just keep coming!)

data.text:
(This feeling that seems like it'll burst, all of it, 
all of it, was for this moment……that's why I will――)
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>(This feeling that seems like it'll burst, all of it, 
<story>all of it, was for this moment……that's why I will――)

data.text: Right here, to everyone――Haaaaaaaa――!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>Right here, to everyone――Haaaaaaaa――!

data.text:
Breaking through the crowd――Marvelous Sunday pushes through! 
With her red ribbon fluttering, she closes with the front!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Breaking through the crowd――Marvelous Sunday pushes through! 
<story>With her red ribbon fluttering, she closes with the front!

data.text:
Marvelous Sunday claws her way to the front! 
Will she make it, will she make it, the winner is――
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Marvelous Sunday claws her way to the front! 
<story>Will she make it, will she make it, the winner is――

data.text: Marvelous Sunday
data.name: Announcer
data.processed: <story>Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Ahahaa……everyone's smiles are so bright……! I wonder if 
they felt it? That feeling right now is Marvelous☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Ahahaa……everyone's smiles are so bright……! I wonder if 
<story>they felt it? That feeling right now is Marvelous☆

data.text:
(As I thought, this is it! I can reach them……! They still haven't 
realized it, but this world is overflowing with Marvelous――)
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>(As I thought, this is it! I can reach them……! They still haven't 
<story>realized it, but this world is overflowing with Marvelous――)

data.text: (If I'm together with them, then……!!)
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>(If I'm together with them, then……!!)

data.text:
Marve-chin~!! Amazing, amazing, you did it! 
Maya, I was excited all the way to the end, you know!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun
data.processed:
<story>Marve-chin~!! Amazing, amazing, you did it! 
<story>Maya, I was excited all the way to the end, you know!

data.text:
Even though you were bad at pacing before. To think 
you'd learn to hold back on moving forward this 
much……looks like I can't just rest on my laurels!
data.name: Sakura Laurel
data.processed:
<story>Even though you were bad at pacing before. To think 
<story>you'd learn to hold back on moving forward this 
<story>much……looks like I can't just rest on my laurels!

data.text:
Hey hey, that was better than I expected, Marvelous Sunday. 
She'll definitely get better and better from here on――!
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Hey hey, that was better than I expected, Marvelous Sunday. 
<story>She'll definitely get better and better from here on――!

data.text:
I'd heard she had a frail body, but I wonder if that's not 
the case anymore. If she's managed properly, then maybe――
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer B
data.processed:
<story>I'd heard she had a frail body, but I wonder if that's not 
<story>the case anymore. If she's managed properly, then maybe――

data.text:
Hyaa~~ already basking in the spotlight, huh? Looks like 
things are looking rosy for you so……what're you gonna do?
data.name: Nice Nature
data.processed:
<story>Hyaa~~ already basking in the spotlight, huh? Looks like 
<story>things are looking rosy for you so……what're you gonna do?

data.text: I won't do anything! After all, I've already made up my mind☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed: <story>I won't do anything! After all, I've already made up my mind☆

data.text:
Did ya see that, Trainer!? The moment I showed everyone 
Marvelous! An exciting, heart-thumping, amazing Marvelous☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>Did ya see that, Trainer!? The moment I showed everyone 
<story>Marvelous! An exciting, heart-thumping, amazing Marvelous☆

data.text:
But, this isn't enough. Besides, this is only 
the beginner Marvelous☆ In the racing world, 
there's definitely a more wonderful Marvelous★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>But, this isn't enough. Besides, this is only 
<story>the beginner Marvelous☆ In the racing world, 
<story>there's definitely a more wonderful Marvelous★

data.text:
If I'm with Trainer, I think I can reach it! 
So, please, together with me, help me show them Marvelous!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>If I'm with Trainer, I think I can reach it! 
<story>So, please, together with me, help me show them Marvelous!

data.text:
So it reaches far and wide――I want the world to 
know that Marvelous is all around us……that's why――!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday
data.processed:
<story>So it reaches far and wide――I want the world to 
<story>know that Marvelous is all around us……that's why――!

data.text:
Of course, I had already decided. I wanted to keep 
supporting her, helping her spread the Marvelous word.
data.processed:
<story>Of course, I had already decided. I wanted to keep 
<story>supporting her, helping her spread the Marvelous word.

data.text:
She wanted everyone to know that wonderful 
surprises were all around. I wanted to help 
someone with such a wholesome wish. That's why――
data.processed:
<story>She wanted everyone to know that wonderful 
<story>surprises were all around. I wanted to help 
<story>someone with such a wholesome wish. That's why――

data.text:
And so, the days of conveying that ideal with the 
super-positive Uma Musume, Marvelous Sunday, began――!
data.processed:
<story>And so, the days of conveying that ideal with the 
<story>super-positive Uma Musume, Marvelous Sunday, began――!
